page.title: 07Religion in Jedburgh
page.content: We have three churches,two of them Church Of Scotland and one Scottish Episcopalian.The Parish Church has about 1000 members.It is linked with Ancrum and Edgerston.The Parish Church has 1 Sunday service.To assist him the minister has the help of 2 lay preachers and a probationer assistant minister.The church has a Sunday School,Bible Class,B.B,s Women's Guild and Young Mothers' Group.Trinity Church is the next largest church.It has 2 services on Sundays.It has all the organisations mentioned above apart from the B.B's.St John's is a Scottish Episcopalian church.It is the smallest of the 3 churches.There are also Roman Catholics in the town but their church is not in our block.There is a small meeting place for Baptists.
